title: Lenovo ThinkPad Z-Series: the new laptops on the block
description: Lenovo launched a new line of ThinkPads at CES 2022. The Z-Series targets a Gen-Z audience, sporting a thin and light build, multiple color options, eco-friendly packaging, and new AMD processors.
